summary: I was hired by Somo to work on a greenfield project which focused on building a tool enabling a website to be constructed from scratch, from a collection of custom written re-usable React components. These components could then be edited and configured in a variety of different ways. On top of this, a range of themes, layouts, templates, fonts etc. were also created, in order to offer yet more customization options to each unique website.

linkedInRecommendations.name: Robin Lewis
linkedInRecommendations.recommendation: I was recently lucky enough to have Martin join a team for which I am the ScrumMaster. Martin joined the project mid-way through, and had no problem in quickly getting himself up to speed on the work required of him. More than that though, from my point of view as a ScrumMaster, I was very impressed with how Martin always made sure to keep me up to date with the status of his work and any impediments he could foresee that I could help to remove. In my opinion, Martin is a dedicated and thorough developer, and I would be more than happy to work with him again in the future!

linkedInRecommendations.name: Todd Francis
linkedInRecommendations.recommendation: Martin picked up the project really quickly and was making valuable commits from the get go. He was great to work with, very personable and I'd be happy to work with him again on future projects.

linkedInRecommendations.name: Marta Moskwa
linkedInRecommendations.recommendation: I can highly recommend Martin to you. He cares about the details of UI component design and makes sure they look just like they've been designed. He represents both the technical and artistic sides of development, making it easy to explain design ideas to him. Martin showed a very positive attitude during our collaboration and I hope to work with him again in the future.
